Posts.EditableText:
Do any of you play other online game that are worth a shot?  I've sampled a lot out there but I seem to always lose motivation to play them after a couple months.  I'm looking for good MMORPG's that have some life and equipment customizations with a decent community.

Currently, I'm trying Royal Quest from ARC but it is losing steam after a couple months.

Posts.EditableText:
I played World of Warcraft for the best part of a decade before officially quitting last October. Such an amazing game in its heyday, such a bad game now. I'd be back in a heartbeat if they launched a classic server but the current one just holds no appeal for me.

Other than that, I've played quite a few MMOs over the years - Lord of the Rings and Rift being my favourite - and I'm currently having a blast in Diablo 3. I've also played the GTA games, though I haven't got into GTA 5 yet.

Posts.EditableText:
I wish I was a kid again and could game 24/7... so many amazing games out there now, sighs, I just don't have the time or money, sighs.

I love SNES type RPGs, RPGs (like Morrowind, never played Oblivion and Skyrim), and stragedy-build games (like Civ4, and especially the Fall From Heaven 1 and 2 mods for it).

I played most NES and SNES, and some PS1 games. Especially, the RPGs, only a few still for the PS1 that I've not played.

I play some fan-made computer games too.

I played Starcraft, Diablo, Diablo 2, Civ 1-4, Myst, Morrowind, etc etc etc... I'll get a full list up later as got to go to school class right now, lol.
